author: ChiaraBm
name: WebApp
description: Blazor WASM Web App hosted by an ASP.NET Core Web API using ShadcnBlazor, OIDC and PostgreSQL

manualInstructions.text: Template successfully applied. Before running the generated application, go to the Api project, copy the appsettings.Example.json and create a new appsettings.json file with the same content and fill in connection credentials to a postgres database. Also go into the Frontend project and open a terminal in the styles folder and run 'npn init' and 'npm run tailwind' to ensure the styles have been build
